ud3.2:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ud3.2:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evamāroceti:
ud3.2:3.5: na sakkomi brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī”ti.
ud3.2:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.2:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud3.2:4.4: “āyasmā, bhante, nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evamāroceti:
ud3.2:4.5: ‘anabhirato ahaṃ, āvuso, brahmacariyaṃ carāmi, na sakkomi brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī’”ti.
ud3.2:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi:
ud3.2:5.2: “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena nandaṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantehi:
ud3.2:5.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā nando tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.2:6.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā nando tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.2:6.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
ud3.2:7.1: “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, nanda, sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evamārocesi:
ud3.2:7.2: ‘anabhirato ahaṃ, āvuso, brahmacariyaṃ carāmi, na sakkomi brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī’”ti?
ud3.2:8.1: “Kissa pana tvaṃ, nanda, anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ carasi, na sakkosi brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissasī”ti?
ud3.2:8.2: “Sākiyānī maṃ, bhante, janapadakalyāṇī gharā nikkhamantassa upaḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi apaloketvā maṃ etadavoca:
ud3.2:8.4: So kho ahaṃ, bhante, tamanussaramāno anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ carāmi, na sakkomi brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī”ti.
ud3.2:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā—
ud3.2:9.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
ud3.2:10.1: Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni accharāsatāni sakkassa devānamindassa upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatāni honti kakuṭapādāni.
ud3.2:10.2: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ āmantesi:
ud3.2:10.3: “passasi no tvaṃ, nanda, imāni pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭapādānī”ti?
ud3.2:11.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, nanda, katamā nu kho abhirūpatarā vā dassanīyatarā vā pāsādikatarā vā, sākiyānī vā janapadakalyāṇī, imāni vā pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭapādānī”ti?
ud3.2:11.3: evamevaṃ kho, bhante, sākiyānī janapadakalyāṇī imesaṃ pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ upanidhāya saṅkhyampi nopeti kalabhāgampi nopeti upanidhimpi nopeti.
ud3.2:11.4: Atha kho imāni pañca accharāsatāni abhirūpatarāni ceva dassanīyatarāni ca pāsādikatarāni cā”ti.
ud3.2:12.2: Ahaṃ te pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānan”ti.
ud3.2:12.3: “Sace me, bhante, bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ, abhiramissāmahaṃ, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariye”ti.
ud3.2:13.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā—
ud3.2:13.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
ud3.2:14.2: “āyasmā kira nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto accharānaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carati;
ud3.2:14.3: bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānan”ti.
ud3.2:15.1: Atha kho āyasmato nandassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca samudācaranti:
ud3.2:15.2: “bhatako kirāyasmā nando upakkitako kirāyasmā nando accharānaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carati;
ud3.2:15.3: bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānan”ti.
ud3.2:16.1: Atha kho āyasmā nando sahāyakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca aṭṭīyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
ud3.2:16.2: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
ud3.2:16.3: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
ud3.2:16.4: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
ud3.2:16.5: Aññataro kho panāyasmā nando arahataṃ ahosi.
ud3.2:17.1: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.2:17.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud3.2:17.4: “āyasmā, bhante, nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
ud3.2:17.6: “nando āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
ud3.2:18.1: Atha kho āyasmā nando tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.2:18.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā nando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud3.2:18.4: “yaṃ me, bhante, bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ, muñcāmahaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ etasmā paṭissavā”ti.
ud3.2:18.5: “Mayāpi kho tvaṃ, nanda, cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
ud3.2:18.6: ‘nando āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
ud3.2:18.8: ‘āyasmā, bhante, nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
ud3.2:18.9: Yadeva kho te, nanda, anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, athāhaṃ mutto etasmā paṭissavā”ti.
ud3.2:19.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
